managerPlan.paymentErrorMsg: Error trying to make the payment, please try again!
managerPlan.toUpdatePaymentPreference: To update, go to the payment method
managerPlan.inputCardNumberRequired: The Card Number field is required
managerPlan.confirmSignatureCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your plan subscription?
managerPlan.confirmSignatureCancelDescription: You will have access to your instance only during the current plan's term until the expiration date, after which you will no longer have access to your instance without a registered plan!
managerPlan.confirmCancellationSignature: Do you wish to continue with the cancellation?
managerPlan.changePlanModalTitle: Which plan would you like to Upgrade/Downgrade to?
managerPlan.changePlanModalDescription1: By changing to a simpler plan, you will continue using your current plan with all its benefits until its expiration date, and then the new simpler plan will take effect along with the charge for the new amount.
managerPlan.changePlanModalDescription2: By changing to a higher plan, the difference between the current plan and the new plan will be charged, and the expiration date will be updated to the date of the change to the new plan. The new plan will be available immediately after payment.
managerPlan.newSignatureTextOne: - If a coupon is applied, this value will only be valid for the first payment; for subsequent charges, the full plan amount will be charged!
managerPlan.newSignatureTextTwo: - By upgrading to a higher plan, the difference between the current plan and the new plan will be charged, and the expiration date will be updated to the date of the change to the new plan. The new plan will be available immediately after payment.
managerPlan.newSignatureTextThree: - By downgrading to a simpler plan, you will use the current plan until the expiration date, and after that date, the change will be made to the new plan along with the charge for the new amount.

driver.descriptionTour1: When a PDF file is available to create a signature, the 'Sign' option will be available to sign.
driver.descriptionTour2: When a document has a created signature but has not been signed yet, the 'See Document' option will be available to check the document and sign.
driver.descriptionTour3: When a document is Signed the 'See Signature' option will be available to view the Signed document.
driver.descriptionTour4: To create a signature with more than one document just select them and if all have the signature available the 'Sign' option will be available.

documentToSign.errorOrNotDoc: An issue occurred or Document unavailable at the moment
documentToSign.tourDescription1: To Create a Signature, click on the 'Create Signature' button
documentToSign.tourDescription2: Click on Multiple Signatures to proceed.
documentToSign.tourDescription3: Fill in the Signature Title fields and Choose the Signatories for this signature.
documentToSign.tourDescription4: To Add a Signatory from within the System, search by name and add them to the list by clicking on the indicated button in the image.
documentToSign.tourDescription5: To add an External Signatory, click on 'External Party' and this frame will open, fill in the fields with the external signatory's information and click 'Add' to add them to the Signatories list.
documentToSign.tourDescription6: When a document is ready to be signed, this 'Sign' button will appear for the user to sign.
documentToSign.tourDescription7: To Sign a document, you can verify your identity by signing through your account password or by a Token sent to your email.
documentToSign.docSignToEveryone: Document Signed by Everyone - You signed on date
documentToSign.onlyPdf: You can only sign if the document is of type PDF
documentToSign.docCancel: This document was automatically canceled due to process cancellation.
